Workflow that enables the follow up and the validation of the contracts Short Term and Middle term (GG+LNG+ccapacity) between several interlocutors
Workflow de suivi et de validation des Contrats CT et MT (GG+GNL) +Capacit√© entre nterlocuteurs internes.

The Automatic Deal Capture Service (ADCS) is a WCF Service that acts as a SPOC for all external data sources that want to send deal data information into the ZaiNet system. The ADC service will perform basic input validation and business validation on the incoming data.
The ADC service aligns with ETRM business objectives:
   -       Consistent interface: one-for-all
   -       Data correctness: validation of incoming data
   -       Reduced maintenance costs
   -       Increased logging and auditing possibilities
Additionally we distinguish following benefits:
   -       Full support of Zainet 8.3 functionalities
   -       Better management of applications that use deal-capturing of ZaiNet
   -       Secure 
       o   By transport layer (all communication in HTTPS)
       o   By client certificates (only for external applications)
   -       Possibility to regulate incoming deal traffic (overcome peaks in deal creation)
   -       Response mechanism to inform on success or error
The Automatic Deal Capture service 2.0 is specific created to support the functionalities that Zainet 8.3 offers. This document outlines all changes from ADCS 1.0 and details how the functionalities must be used in the capture process.

Belongs to ETRM
Pre-project
Belgium Germany

Automatic Deal capture System : interface to automatic deal creation.
There is no risk associated to ADCS access, since an access to ZAINET is needed to enter deals: an access to ADCS only is not sufficient
